Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: ExternalDataExchange インターフェイスで定義されたメソッドとイベントで、関連付けに使用されるパラメーターの名前を示します。 このクラスは継承できません。

remarks.format:
## 解説
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
Default setting; can be overridden by the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CorrelationAliasAttribute>.
## 例 The following code example demonstrates how to use a CorrelationParameterAttribute for an EnternalDataExchange interface. This code example is from the CorrelatedLocalService SDK sample. For more information, see [Correlated Local Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/ja-jp/5a3d0733-bbea-4dbf-88ee-a8316db55fbd).
